name: Customize Dokan Dashboard Endpoints
author: SysBasics

sections.description:
Customize Dokan Dashboard Endpoints

Customize your default Customize Dokan Dashboard Endpoints. Reorder them , hide existing core endpoints.

Want to add custom endpoints with shortcode ? check Customize Dokan Dashboard Endpoints Pro

Customize Dokan Dashboard Endpoints features

  • Modify existing endpoints.
  • Add custom links to your dokan vendor dashboard.
  • Drag and drop UI.

Customize Dokan Dashboard Endpoints free version features

  • Add new Link or Menu to exitings dokan dashboard endpoints
  • Reorder core dokan dashboard endpoints
  • Hide Core Dashboard Endpoints
  • Drag and Drop UI
  • Add Icon to existing dokan dashbaord Endpoints
  • Adding Extra Menu on Vendor Dashboard

Customize Dokan Dashboard Endpoints pro version features

  • All Features of free version
  • Add new custom endpoint
  • Use shortcode inside endpoint
  • 6 months included support
  • 6 months automatic upgrade from your dashboard
  • Use on 3 domains (Staging , Live and Localhost)

Color Image Variation Swatches For WooCommerce Plugin

Color Image Variation Swatches For WooCommerce For WooCommerce Plugin allows you to convert your regular woocommerce default dropdown into nicely looking color/image/taxt select

Checkout Color Image Variation Swatches For WooCommerce

short_description: Customize Customize Dokan Dashboard Endpoints. Modify existing Endpoints as well as add new endpoints.
